name: applause-reporter-testsuite
description: Boilerplate project to run tests against the Applause Automation services

scripts.ci: npm run ci:wdio && npm run ci:playwright
scripts.install: npm run install:wdio && npm run install:playwright
scripts.test: npm run test:wdio && npm run test:playwright
scripts.test:lint: npm run test:lint:wdio && npm run test:lint:playwright
